summary: This is a calendar invitation/email for an internal FBI meeting titled 'Epstein update' scheduled for September 18, 2019, in the ADIC's conference room. It shows coordination among FBI personnel in New York and possibly other offices regarding the Epstein case shortly after his death.

events.title: Epstein update meeting
events.description: A scheduled meeting among FBI personnel to discuss updates on the Epstein case, held in the ADIC's conference room.

keyFacts: An FBI meeting titled 'Epstein update' was scheduled for September 18, 2019, indicating ongoing investigation activities after Epstein's death in August 2019.
The meeting was organized by an FBI personnel in New York and involved multiple FBI recipients from New York and possibly the Domestic Operations (DO) division.
The document shows internal FBI coordination and scheduling regarding the Epstein case, with the meeting classified as 'X-PERSONAL'.
